00014 std::ostream * Log::outputStream = &(std::cerr);

00020 std::string Log::GetTime() {
00021         time_t t = time(NULL);
00022         return std::string(asctime(gmtime(&t))); //return a formatted string of the timestamp
00023 }
00024 
00025 std::string Log::ToString( LOG_LEVEL level ) {
00026         switch(level){
00027         case FATAL:
00028                 return std::string("FATAL");
00029                 break;
00030         case ERROR:
00031                 return std::string("ERROR");
00032                 break;
00033         case WARNING:
00034                 return std::string("WARNING");
00035                 break;
00036         case INFO:
00037                 return std::string("INFO");
00038                 break;
00039         case DEBUG:
00040                 return std::string("DEBUG");
00041                 break;
00042         case DEBUG2:
00043                 return std::string("DEBUG2");
00044                 break;
00045         case DEBUG3:
00046                 return std::string("DEBUG3");
00047                 break;
00048         case DEBUG4:
00049                 return std::string("DEBUG4");
00050                 break;
00051         default:
00052                 return std::string("ERROR IN LOGGING UTILITY");
00053                 break;
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 std::stringstream& Log::Get(LOG_LEVEL level) {
00058 
00059         if(Log::timestamp) {
00060                 this->os << "- " << Log::GetTime();
00061         }
00062 
00063         this->os << " " << Log::ToString(level) << ": ";
00064         this->os << std::string(level > DEBUG ? 1 :  DEBUG - level, '\t' ); //Set increasing number of tabs for higher debug levels
00065         messageLevel = level;
00066         return os;
00067 }
00068 
00069 LOG_LEVEL & Log::ReportingLevel() {     return Log::logLevel; }

00071 unsigned int Log::GetReportStreamBits() { return Log::streamBits; }
00072 
00073 void Log::SetReportStreamBits( unsigned int s ) { Log::streamBits = ~s; }
00074 
00075 void Log::SetTimeStampDisplay( bool ts ) { Log::timestamp = ts; }
00076 
00077 void Log::SetReportLevel( LOG_LEVEL level ) { logLevel = level; }

00079 Log::~Log() {
00080 
00081         if (messageLevel >= Log::ReportingLevel())
00082         {
00083                 (*Log::GetOStream()) << os.str();
00084                 Log::GetOStream()->flush();
00085         }
00086 
00087         if( FATAL == messageLevel ) {
00088                 throw new exception();
00089         }
00090 }
